title: fetch.request
description: Request to fetch or retrieve items from a specified source using a query or filter.

x402.description: x402 envelope describing the verb, version, and optional routing metadata.

source.description: Logical source identifier or base URI (e.g., index name, collection, API endpoint).

query.description: Query, filter, or search expression to select items.

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to return.

include_metadata.description: Whether to include source-specific metadata in the result items.

metadata.description: Opaque caller-defined metadata that does not affect semantics.
